ai-pv14:0.3_0: The senior monks should appoint Sāriputta’s Mother.
ai-pv14:1.1_0: It’s not easy to become ugly
ai-pv14:2.1_0: I’ll make your mother and father,
ai-pv14:2.3_0: The ghost realm has been reborn in the ghost realm,
ai-pv14:4.1_0: Fear regarding the nose as the tongue,
ai-pv14:5.3_0: free of thorns, with no shelter,
ai-pv14:5.4_0: and blue is bound for darkness.
ai-pv14:6.1_0: Our child, when they give gifts
ai-pv14:6.2_0: while giving to me like a snake,
ai-pv14:7.1_0: Do not listen to the teaching,
ai-pv14:8.1_0: I plunged into the four huts
ai-pv14:8.2_0: controlled in the Saṅgha of four quarters,
ai-pv14:9.1_0: Those who are diligent and discerning,
ai-pv14:9.4_0: This is the fruit for the south.
ai-pv14:10.2_0: and I wear the finest Kāsi cloth:
ai-pv14:13.2_0: You’re doing good deeds by human beings!
ai-pv14:13.4_0: your beauty shines like the quarter.”
ai-pv14:14.3_0: The ghost realm has been reborn in the ghost realm,
ai-pv14:16.1_0: Fear regarding the nose as the tongue,
ai-pv14:17.1_0: This body is full of pus and blood,
ai-pv14:17.3_0: free of thorns, with no shelter,
ai-pv14:17.4_0: and blue is bound for darkness.
ai-pv14:18.2_0: and fearful, fearing nothing from any quarter.
ai-pv14:19.1_0: Venerable Sāriputta, the most senior monk should make the site for a second month.’
